events.message: I received the product yesterday, but unfortunately it has several scratches on the surface and one of the buttons is not working.
The reported issue involves product damage and defect, as scratches and faulty buttons were mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in product defects for further assistance.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the issue with your product. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the faulty button so that we can assess the damage properly?
Sure, I’ve attached several pictures showing the scratches and the button that won’t press down properly.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer to have a replacement sent to me as soon as possible, thank you for the quick response.
Great! We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped within 2 business days. You will receive tracking details shortly.
We wanted to check in and make sure you have received your replacement product and that it arrived in perfect condition.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is perfect now. Thanks for the excellent support!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the support case now, and we appreciate your feedback.
